entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
